thread.section_title: eFaucets.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eFaucets.com | www.efaucets.com
thread.title: Bryan

author: Bryan
title: Bryan
text: Using the internet I purchased a set of valves from eFaucets. They appeared to be the correct ones by the picture eFaucet had on there site. In size , shape and everything . When I got them they were the wrong ones. I called to find out how to exchange them for the correct ones. I was told that exchanging would cost me more then the parts cost so i'd lose money. To me they should fix there site to better represent the part so customers like myself will not order the wrong part because they are miss represented in the picture.
